title: Layout
description: Selects one of the different layouts that are available.

title: Text
description: Pre-populated text highlighted in the Tweet composer.

title: Hashtags
description: A comma-separated list of hashtags to be appended to default Tweet text.

title: Via
description: Attribute the source of a Tweet to a Twitter username.

title: Related
description: A comma-separated list of accounts related to the content of the shared URI.

title: Data pin save
description: If set to false, show an old-style 'Pin It' button. (Not recommended for non-English sites.)

title: Data pin do
description: Determines whether the Pinner can save any image from the page.

title: Data pin round
description: Changes the Save button to the round and red style.

title: Data pin tall
description: Changes the height of the Save button.
